attributes.action: Government to indicate the UK is open to sell itself to the US
attributes.additional_details: Normally parliament does not get involved in what a foreign state might want to do. This petition is to ask the government to make it known to the US that it is ready to negotiate a sale, not to act on a sale directly right away.
attributes.background: Calling on HM Government to indicate that it is in principle open to negotiations for the sale of all or some of the constituent countries of the United Kingdom to the United States of America, with the constituent becoming one or more federal states of the Union

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.  

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do as we're not sure if you'd like 'all' or 'some' of the UK to be included in your proposal.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
